text: Ɔhunuu ɔbarima bi wɔ dan mu hɔ a na ne nsa baako awu. Farisifoɔ no bisaa Yesu sɛ, “Enti mmara ma ho kwan sɛ obi sa yadeɛ Homeda anaa?”12.10 Mmara akyerɛkyerɛfoɔ mma ayaresa ho kwan homeda; gye sɛ wɔhunu sɛ, sɛ wɔansa ɔyarefoɔ no yadeɛ da no ara na adeɛ kye a, ɔbɛwu. Obi a na ne nsa awu no deɛ na ɛnyɛ deɛ owuo hunahuna noɔ. Wɔbisaa yei sɛdeɛ ɛbɛyɛ a wɔbɛnya ɛkwan atoto nʼano na wɔakye no!
